name: Theory of Computation
text:
Converting PDA to special form
We assume:
- Our PDA M has only one accept state
- It requires the stack to be completely empty before accepting
- A transition must involve a push or a pop, but not both

fullContent:
Converting PDA to special form
We assume:
- Our PDA M has only one accept state
- It requires the stack to be completely empty before accepting
- A transition must involve a push or a pop, but not both
